description: small beaded and padded baby carrier; green and white leaf print lining; white beaded field with geometric designs in brown, blue, green and yellow; backing piece attached to two vertical pieces of wood decorated with studs
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
medium: Beads, cotton, wood, rawhide, animal hide, studs
signed: on back, in black: [J.L.Q. Denny/ St. Stephens WY/ 2003]
text: The appeal of miniature cradleboards is not lost with the collecting market because they are easily displayed and attractive. Small versions of large scale works are highly desired; both historic and contemporary versions are in demand. This example is a perfect miniature version of a cradleboard like those created full-scale over 100 years ago.
title: Cradle Board
